title: Disaster Management Literacy (DML) Hub Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of disaster management and experience in organizational collaboration
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for current practitioners, utilizing actual case-based digital platforms

learning_goals: Learners can analyze audiovisual educational content using disaster management knowledge, skills, and attitudes (DML 3 elements) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design core functionalities of the DML hub (resource sharing, assessment system) through project-based collaboration.
Learners can apply three or more practical competencies (based on ICS) in disaster response simulations through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
